attributes.action: ABOLISH ALL HILLSBOROUGH SICK GROUPS LAUGHING AT THE DEAD ON FACEBOOK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE ASK THE PRIME MINISTER TO ABOLISH ALL THE SICK GROUPS ON FACEBOOK.CONCERNING HILLSBOROUGH 1989 THESE GROUPS ARE LAUGHING AT DEAD PEOPLE,AND FACEBOOK ARE SUPPORTING THESE GROUPS BY ALLOWING THEM TO BE MADE AND LEAVING THEM OPEN

rejection.details: Please resubmit without the excessive use of capitals.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
